actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-17, by Mr. Moakley.

Rule provides for consideration of h.R 1175 to H.R. 1175 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. It shall be in order to consider the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Armed Services now printed in the bill, as modified by the amendments printed in part one of the report accompanying this resolution, as an original bill for the purpose of amendment. Said substitute, as modified, shall be considered read and all points of order against said substitute shall
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 7.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 247 - 171 (Roll no. 44).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1175) to authorize supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1991 in connection with operations in and around the Persian Gulf presently known as Operation Desert Shield/Storm, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1175 (supplemental appropriations for Operations Desert Shield and Desert Storm).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1175) to authorize supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 1991 in connection with operations in and around the Persian Gulf presently known as Operation Desert Shield/Storm, and for other purposes.
